entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kawartha Lakes (Lindsay)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:14 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 4:16 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 2.0°C
Pressure: 100.5 kPa
Visibility: 9.7 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 2.0°C
Wind: ENE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Fog patches developing early this evening and dissipating near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 late this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light before morning. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
